reactivate
**********


Description
===========

Reactivates a namespace. Reactivating a namespace will not reactivate
any tag definition that is retired when the namespace was retired.
They will have to be individually reactivated *after* the namespace is
reactivated.


Usage
=====

   oci iam tag-namespace reactivate [OPTIONS]


Options
=======


--tag-namespace-id [text]
-------------------------

The OCID of the tag namespace. [required]


--from-json [text]
------------------

Provide input to this command as a JSON document from a file.

Options can still be provided on the command line. If an option exists
in both the JSON document and the command line then the command line
specified value will be used


-?, -h, --help
--------------

For detailed help on any of these individual commands, enter <command>
--help.
